backend/main.mo: Defines task, user, and category types, initializes access control and storage mixins, and implements admin‑restricted APIs for managing assignee/captain pairs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components for bulk upload and ownership‑handling changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for major frontend files including components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring theme, error boundaries, and tabbed navigation for dashboard, tasks, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Login gate screen prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity.
Admin dialog for creating tasks with full field set, validation, and data loading for categories, statuses, and assignee directory.
frontend/src/components/AppBootstrap.tsx: Initializes authenticated app state, handling identity, actor creation, profile/admin queries, and showing loading, error, or setup screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadErrorScre: Displays a user-friendly error screen with reload and optional retry actions when the app fails to load.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDetailsT: Provides a UI to view, edit, or delete a single assignee–captain pair with confirmation dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDirector: Manages the full assignee–captain directory with add, edit, delete, bulk CSV import, and detailed per-assignee tabs.
frontend/src/components/BulkUploadSectio: Handles bulk task creation via CSV/Excel upload with parsing, validation, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/CategoryManageme: Allows creation and listing of task categories, subcategories, statuses, and payment statuses using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple site footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the app header with branding, theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for collecting and saving initial user profile information.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Catches runtime React errors and shows a fallback error screen while logging diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog: Renders a dialog with task list and task detail tabs, supporting editing and tab management.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailsTab.t: Shows detailed task information with formatted fields and an edit option for admins.
frontend/src/components/TaskFormDialog.t: Form dialog for creating or updating tasks, including field population, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Empty placeholder file for user management functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, managing identity loading, login state, and error handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend tasks and user data, including fetch, mutate, filtering, and error parsing helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Wraps useActor with timeout, error handling, and retry support to ensure reliable backend actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useTaskDetailTabs.ts: Manages tab state for viewing multiple task detail panels, including opening, closing, updating, and resetting tabs.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with tabs for bulk upload, category settings, and assignee management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays charts and task statistics with filters, enabling drill-down into tasks by category, status, or payment status.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable task list with create, edit, delete, and tabbed task detail viewing functionality.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Provides helpers to generate, download, and parse assignee/captain CSV files with basic validation and quoted-value parsing.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: Implements redacted diagnostic logging for initialization and runtime errors, including step-based init logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across normal and hash-based routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for a task assignment app using assignee and captain names.
